description: Next, Lucas is at work, directing a scene between his horsehung discovery Chad Hunt and toned newcomer Jessie Bryce. Before the shoot begins, Lucas asks Hunt if he would be willing to anchor a threeway scene the next day as well, and Hunt agrees. The scene begins, and tattooed loveboy Hunt gives it long and hard to Bryce, who whimpers as he tries to accommodate Hunts mammoth tool. After the shoot, Lucas promises Hunt hell be paid after the orgy.
title: Chad Hunt, Michael Lucas, and Jessie Bryce
